column5: Anyone have info on Sturgeon Lake ice.
Satellite photos show it breaking up some. Should be open in less than a week. Temps in the mid 50's for Ignace for the next week.

I flew off our lake yesterday (walleye lake), there was still some areas of ice on the trout lakes, but would guess after the wind we had today, most of the lakes will be open. Sturgeon should be out shortly also.
Open from White Sands to Maries Bay ............... no ice in sight
Thanks everyone for the information. 2 more weeks!!!!
